message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. I think this is a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $13,750?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your budget, $13,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. This would allow us both to get a fair deal.  Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $13,750, which is right in the middle of my previous offer and your new offer. Can we do that?
